name: BnuyBattle!
description:
This is a small wave based survival game that I put together to learn more about how Unity works. I'm at a point where I want to work on other projects, so I'm just going to call it on this one. Maybe I'll add more to it sometime in the future though!

Controls:

WSAD / IKJL / Left Stick - Movement

Q/E or U/O or LB/RB or Mouse Wheel - Camera Zoom

Mouse Movement / Right Stick - Camera Rotation

Spacebar / A - Jump

Left Click / X - Attack

Right Click / Y - Knockup

Shift / B - Dodge

Caps Lock (Toggle) / RT (Hold) - Lock on (Based on character orientation)

P / Start - Pause and Settings

Assets used:
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/snes-fantasy-retro-jrpg-music-...
